channel.title: CVE Feed for FormosaSoft -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for FormosaSoft -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-9981|2024-10-15T13:54:14.734Z -- formosasoft -- ee-class
item.description: The ee-class from FormosaSoft does not properly validate a specific page parameter, allowing remote attackers with regular privileges to upload a malicious PHP file first and then exploit this vulnerability to include the file, resulting in arbitrary code execution on the server.

item.title: CVE-2024-9980|2024-10-15T13:56:27.287Z -- formosasoft -- ee-class
item.description: The ee-class from FormosaSoft does not properly validate a specific page parameter, allowing remote attackers with regular privileges to inject arbitrary SQL commands to read, modify and delete database contents.

item.title: CVE-2024-9980|2024-10-15T07:52:48.554Z -- formosasoft -- ee-class
item.description: The ee-class from FormosaSoft does not properly validate a specific page parameter, allowing remote attackers with regular privileges to inject arbitrary SQL commands to read, modify and delete database contents.

item.title: CVE-2024-9981|2024-10-15T07:57:31.598Z -- formosasoft -- ee-class
item.description: The ee-class from FormosaSoft does not properly validate a specific page parameter, allowing remote attackers with regular privileges to upload a malicious PHP file first and then exploit this vulnerability to include the file, resulting in arbitrary code execution on the server.
